Table.name: Table1
Table.sql: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) C FROM (SELECT DISTINCT IPART_NO FROM SMINP WHERE U_FID=':=uid') T) C, (SELECT SUM(CASE_NUM) SUM_CASE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT CASE_NO,CASE_NUM FROM SMINP WHERE U_FID=':=uid') T) SUM_CASE, (SELECT COUNT(*) SUM_PLT FROM (SELECT DISTINCT PLA_NO FROM SMINP WHERE U_FID=':=uid' AND PLA_NO IS NOT NULL AND PLA_NO !='') T) SUM_PLT, (SELECT TOP 1 CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) C FROM SMIND WHERE U_FID=':=uid' GROUP BY U_FID)>1 THEN (SELECT ISNULL(IPART_NO,'')+';' FROM SMIND WHERE CATEGORY!='TANN' AND U_FID=':=uid' FOR XML PATH('')) ELSE IPART_NO END FROM SMIND WHERE U_FID =':=uid') IPART_NO, (SELECT TOP 1 SO_NO FROM SMIND WHERE DN_NO=(SELECT ISNULL(REF_NO,DN_NO) FROM SMDN WHERE DN_NO =(SELECT TOP 1 DN_NO FROM SMINM WHERE U_ID=':=uid'))) SO_NO, (SELECT CNTR_NO FROM SMICNTR WHERE DN_NO LIKE '%'+(SELECT TOP 1 DN_NO FROM SMINM WHERE U_ID=':=uid')+'%' FOR XML PATH('')) AS CNTR_INFO, (SELECT TOP 1 INV_NO FROM SMINM WHERE DN_NO=(SELECT TOP 1 DN_NO_CMP_REF FROM SMDN WHERE DN_NO =(SELECT TOP 1 DN_NO FROM SMINM WHERE U_ID=':=uid'))) INV_NO_REF FROM V_IPQ03 WHERE U_ID=':=uid'

Table.name: SMRV
Table.sql: SELECT CNTR_NO, SEAL_NO1, CNTY_TYPE,DN_NO,GW,NW,CBM FROM SMRV WHERE EXISTS (SELECT A.DN_NO FROM V_IPQ03 A WHERE A.U_ID=':=uid' AND SMRV.DN_NO LIKE '%'+A.DN_NO+'%')
